house_listing.house_description: One of a kind, absolutely must see home! Pristine, meticulously maintained! Good sized rooms, excellent closet space, pool, florida room, deck, well & pump, some hardwood floors, and much more!
house_listing.firm_name: The Prudential Decker Realty The Prudential Decker Realty
